content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal Mine at position (43.0, -84.0)
Consists of a Burner Mining Drill (position 43.0, -84.0) and a Furnace at position (45.0, -83.0)

### Iron Ore Mine at position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of a Burner Mining Drill (position -15.0, -50.0) and a Chest at position (-16.5, -49.5)

### Electricity Generator at position (10.5, 10.5)
Consists of a Steam Engine (position 10.5, 10.5), a Boiler (position -6.0, 24.5), and an Offshore Pump (position -9.5, 24.5)

### Copper Plate Factory
No entities found related to copper plate production

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner mining drills
- Ensure the burner mining drill has fuel before attempting to mine
- Check the warnings for the burner mining drill to identify any issues

### Errors when using furnaces
- Ensure the furnace has the required ingredients to smelt before attempting to smelt
- Check the warnings for the furnace to identify any issues

### Errors when using steam engines
- Ensure the steam engine has input liquid and fluid present in connections before attempting to generate electricity
- Check the warnings for the steam engine to identify any issues

### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure the tile is not occupied by another entity before attempting to place an entity
- Check the entity's tile dimensions to ensure it fits in the desired location

### Errors when using offshore pumps
- Ensure the offshore pump has a connection to a pipe before attempting to pump fluid
- Check the warnings for the offshore pump to identify any issues

### Errors when using labs
- Ensure the lab has the required ingredients to research before attempting to research
- Check the warnings for the lab to identify any issues

### Errors when using burners and inserters
- Ensure the burner or inserter has fuel before attempting to use it
- Check the warnings for the burner or inserter to identify any issues

### Errors when using chests
- Ensure the chest is not full before attempting to insert items
- Check the warnings for the chest to identify any issues

### Errors when using pipes and pipe groups
- Ensure the pipes are connected correctly before attempting to use them
- Check the warnings for the pipes and pipe groups to identify any issues

### Errors when using electricity groups
- Ensure the electricity group has the required poles and connections before attempting to use it
- Check the warnings for the electricity group to identify any issues
